.. _singularity_sif_setprim:

singularity sif setprim
-----------------------

Set primary system partition

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Set the primary system partition in a SIF image.

::

  singularity sif setprim <id> <sif_path>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::

  sif setprim 1 image.sif

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for setprim

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity sif <singularity_sif>` 	 - Manipulate Singularity Image Format (SIF) images
